relation: Win a game in Play Now mode with Skill Level set to All-American and Half Length set to 20 minutes.
Play & win the last game of the Anaheim Classic game mode, All-Conference Difficulty or higher.
Play and win a game on a "buzzer beater" in Play Now at All-Conference Difficulty or higher.
As the lead profile, sign a McDonald's? All-American recruit in Dynasty Mode
Complete a 30-year dynasty in Dynasty Mode.
Win five Xbox LIVE ranked matches with five different teams. DNF wins don't count.
Finish a game where 3 of your players get 20 points at All-Conference Difficulty or higher.
Play & win the last game of the MAUI Invitational game mode, All-Conference Difficulty or higher.
Play and win the McDonald's? All-American game at All-Conference or higher.
Win 30 games or more in three consecutive years in Dynasty Mode.
View your career stats from the My NCAA? Online menu.
Play & win the last game of the NIT? Season Tip-Off game mode, All-Conference Difficulty or higher.
Play & win the last game of the Old Spice Classic game mode, All-Conference Difficulty or higher.
Win all of your team's home games in one season of Dynasty Mode.
Play & win the last game of the Puerto Rico Tip-Off game mode, All-Conference Difficulty or higher.
Make 20 straight baskets in Campus Hoops. Dunks don't count!
Win an Xbox LIVE ranked match against an opponent 5 ranks or higher than you. DNF wins don't count.
Beat an A rank team with a C or lower rank team in Play Now at All-Conference Difficulty or higher.
View the game Credits from the EA Sports Extras menu.
Play in 75 Xbox LIVE ranked matches.
